nodes.bodyText: It seems AppManager.getAppStoreUrl returns a String already, do we need to cast to String here?
Good point, no we don't I'll remove the cast.
If AppHub is the new official term, could we rename the method AppManager.getAppStoreUrl to getAppHubUrl ?

Yes it should be named apphub through the entire code base, I was thinking the full code base rename could be in a separate PR but maybe its just better to get it done all at once. I can have a look, since it would be affecting configuration (dhis.conf) and lots of other places as well.
